message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find this proposal attractive.

Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the exclusivity, $2000000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $1500000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my needs and the market value of similar products.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your feedback and the value you place on the product, we're willing to negotiate further. We propose to offer the product to you for $1750000. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise while still providing us with a reasonable return for our investment. Please let us know if this proposal works for you.

Alice,  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further.  $1750000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1600000. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on this product. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your openness to negotiation. After careful consideration, we're willing to adjust our price to $1650000 for the product. We believe this price strikes a balance between our expectations and your budget. We hope this proposal meets your requirements and allows us to conclude this transaction satisfactorily.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility in adjusting the price.  However,  $1650000 is still slightly higher than I can comfortably go at this time.  I'm prepared to offer $1625000. This is a very fair price considering the value of the product and our back-and-forth negotiation.  Let's finalize this deal.
